pages.title: Vault Charm
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Vault Charm$() is an utility item gated behind the $(#033dfc)Vault Looter$() research.$(br)Unlocking it allows you to craft the $(#033dfc)Vault Charm$() & the $(#033dfc)Vault Charm Inscription Table$(), which allow you to void any item inside a Vault without consuming magnet durability.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use the $(#033dfc)Vault Looter$() research, you need to have a $(#033dfc)Vault Charm$() in your Inventory or Curio slot, additionally, you need to filter Items inside the $(#033dfc)Vault Charm Inscription Table$() to void specific items.$(br2)Following that, items collected inside Vaults will be voided.

pages.title: Upgrading
pages.text: To upgrade the$(#033dfc)Vault Charm Inscription Table$() to increase the slot size, you require upgrades that you can craft. To install higher tier upgrades, the previous tier must be already applied to the $(#033dfc)Vault Charm Inscription Table$().
